item.description:
We've been invited to join meetup friends from Northern Middlesex Singles for a fun night of live music, drinks, and if you wish, dinner beforehand. Sounds like another good time!

Join us at the newly opened British Beer Company in Westford for some drinks and live music. That evening, the band "6 Foot Sunday" will be playing.
Check them out here- http://www.6footsunda...

The band goes on at 10:00, but we'll be meeting at 9:00 so we have a chance to chat before it gets loud!


Some folks are meeting at 7:30 for dinner first. We MUST have you include this in your RSVP for an accurate count, so please mention "yes" or "no" for dinner.

Looking forward to seeing you there!

http://www.britishbee...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Live Music @ British Beer Company - Westford !!
